item.title: Megan Hollister Murray
item.description: Hello! I am a PhD candidate in the Department of Biostatistics at Vanderbilt University. I have a Bachelor’s in Mathematics from Baylor University. In January of 2020 I married the love of my life Paul, shown in the photo.
